question: Padma Shri awardee Giriraj Kishore, who recently passed away was popularly known for his contribution in which of the following field?
explanation: Padma Shri awardee Giriraj Kishore, who recently passed away was an author. He received Padma Shri in 2007 for his novel “Pehla Girmitiya”. He was born in Muzaffarnagar (Uttar Pradesh).
